summary: Complete multi-language translation testing for 5 languages (ES, EN, FR, DE, IT). Tested Login page language selector, Dashboard translations, Evaluaciones page translations, Usuarios page translations, and language persistence across page navigation. All translations working correctly.
passed_tests: Language selector visible on Login page with globe icon
All 5 language options (ES, EN, FR, DE, IT) available in dropdown
Login page Spanish translations: 'Cuaderno de Campo', 'Inicia sesión para continuar', 'Contraseña', 'Iniciar Sesión', 'Credenciales por defecto'
Login page English translations: 'Field Notebook', 'Sign in to continue', 'Password', 'Login', 'Default credentials'
Login page French translations: 'Carnet de terrain', 'Connectez-vous pour continuer', 'Mot de passe', 'Connexion', 'Identifiants par défaut'
Login page German translations: 'Feldbuch', 'Melden Sie sich an, um fortzufahren', 'Passwort', 'Anmelden', 'Standard-Anmeldedaten'
Login page Italian translations: 'Quaderno di campo', 'Accedi per continuare', 'Password', 'Accedi', 'Credenziali predefinite'
Dashboard Spanish labels: 'Contratos Totales', 'Parcelas Activas', 'Tratamientos', 'GESTIÓN PRINCIPAL', 'ACTIVIDADES', 'ADMINISTRACIÓN', 'Cerrar Sesión'
Dashboard English labels: 'Total Contracts', 'Active Parcels', 'Treatments', 'MAIN MANAGEMENT', 'ACTIVITIES', 'ADMINISTRATION', 'Logout'
Dashboard French labels: 'Tableau de bord', 'Contrats totaux', 'Parcelles actives', 'Traitements', 'GESTION PRINCIPALE', 'ACTIVITÉS', 'Déconnexion'
Evaluaciones page Spanish: 'Evaluaciones', 'Filtros', 'Parcelas', 'Cultivos', 'Proveedores', 'Campaña', 'Estado', 'Nueva Evaluación', 'Lista de Evaluaciones', 'Código', 'Técnico', 'Acciones'
Evaluaciones page English: 'Evaluations', 'Filters', 'Parcels', 'Crops', 'Suppliers', 'Campaign', 'Status', 'New Evaluation', 'Evaluation List', 'Code', 'Technician', 'Actions'
Evaluaciones page French: 'Évaluations', 'Filtres', 'Parcelles', 'Cultures', 'Fournisseurs', 'Campagne', 'Statut', 'Nouvelle évaluation', 'Liste des Évaluations', 'Code', 'Technicien', 'Actions'
Usuarios page Spanish: 'Usuarios', 'Gestión de usuarios y permisos', 'Nuevo Usuario', 'Usuarios del Sistema', 'Nombre', 'Email', 'Rol', 'Estado', 'Fecha Creación', 'Acciones', 'Descripción de Roles'
Usuarios page English: 'Users', 'User and permission management', 'New User', 'System Users', 'Name', 'Email', 'Role', 'Status', 'Created At', 'Actions', 'Role Descriptions'

Usuarios page French: 'Utilisateurs', 'Gestion des utilisateurs et permissions', 'Nouvel utilisateur', 'Utilisateurs du Système', 'Nom', 'Email', 'Rôle', 'Statut', 'Date de Création', 'Actions', 'Description des Rôles'
Role translations Spanish: 'Administrador', 'Gerente', 'Técnico', 'Visor' with descriptions
Role translations English: 'Administrator', 'Manager', 'Technician', 'Viewer' with descriptions
Role translations French: 'Administrateur', 'Gestionnaire', 'Technicien', 'Lecteur' with descriptions
Language persistence: French language persists from Dashboard to Evaluaciones to Usuarios
Language stored in localStorage for persistence
Sidebar navigation menu fully translated in all languages
Filter options ('All'/'Todos'/'Tous') translated correctly
Current user indicator translated: '(Tú)'/'(You)'/'(Vous)'
seed_data_creation: No new seed data created. Used existing data for testing.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Multi-language support (ES, EN, FR, DE, IT) fully tested and working. Translation files located at /app/frontend/src/i18n/locales/{lang}.json. LanguageSelector component at /app/frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector.js with data-testid='language-selector-btn' and 'language-option-{code}' for each language. Language is stored in localStorage with key 'language'. All tested pages (Login, Dashboard, Evaluaciones, Usuarios) show correct translations in all 5 languages. Key translation keys tested: suppliers.title, parcels.code, common.all, users.*, evaluations.*, auth.*, nav.*, dashboard.stats.*

translation_coverage_summary.language_persistence: Working - persists across page navigation via localStorage
